name: Tiza's One Key Curse
description:
Tiza's One Key Curse is a game made for GMTK Game Jam 2019!

How to play:
- you play using only one key (click/A/Z/Space/Enter)
- you automatically go right while on air
- the jump height is determined by how long the button is held
- in mid-air is possible to make an attack to make a second jump and chain jumps together
- you gain score while going forward
- the platforms you touch explodes after 2 seconds!

Credits:

- Monogame(XNA)
- Nez Framework for Xna

Background, texts, music, and game idea and logic (coding) were made during the jam

Some assets like the player sprites, enemy sprites and platform were made by me to a platform game
that i'm developing for some time.

Gino Moena 2019.
